scripts.format: cd frontend && npm run format && cd ../backend && npm run format
scripts.lint: cd frontend && npm run lint && cd ../backend && npm run lint
scripts.version: conventional-changelog -p conventionalcommits -i CHANGELOG.md -s && git add CHANGELOG.md
scripts.release:patch: cd backend && npm version patch --commit-hooks false && cd ../frontend && npm version patch --commit-hooks false && cd .. && git add . && npm version patch --force -m 'release: %s' && git push && git push --tags
scripts.release:minor: cd backend && npm version minor --commit-hooks false && cd ../frontend && npm version minor --commit-hooks false && cd .. && git add . && npm version minor --force -m 'release: %s' && git push && git push --tags
scripts.start-standalone:
cd backend
npm install
npm run build
pm2 start --name="pingvin-share-backend" npm -- run prod
cd ../frontend
npm install
npm run build
API_URL=http://localhost:8080
pm2 start npm --name "pingvin-share-frontend" -- run start
scripts.refesh-frontend-standalone:
cd frontend
npm run build
pm2 update
scripts.refesh-backend-standalone:
cd backend
npm run build
pm2 update
